active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the pros and cons of browser-based tools (e.g., Wappalyzer extension) versus CLI tools (e.g., WhatWeb) for web reconnaissance in penetration testing scenarios. Consider factors like stealth, automation, and accuracy in real-world ethical hacking engagements.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in Penetration Testing Tools. Topic: Web Technology Identification Tools (Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Penetration Testing And Ethical Hacking > Penetration Testing Tools > 002_Information Gathering Tools > Web Reconnaissance Tools > Web Technology Identification Tools). Use the provided learning objectives, active learning activities, 4-layer scaffolding, and flashcard schema to generate high-quality Anki-compatible flashcards. Content Context: - Tools: Wappalyzer (browser/CLI, analyzes HTML/headers/JS/meta), WhatWeb (CLI signatures), BuiltWith (web trends). - Key Insight: Knowing a site uses a particular CMS (e.g., WordPress) allows targeted testing for known vulnerabilities (OWASP). - Sources: https://www.wappalyzer.com/, https://www.morningstarsecurity.com/research/whatweb, https://builtwith.com/, OWASP Testing Guide v4, NIST SP 800-115. - Prereqs: HTTP basics, web recon. Incorporate: - Bloom's progression per objectives. - Scaffolding layers explicitly. - Voter priorities: Completeness (tools, OWASP), pedagogy (objectives), scaffolding. - Active elements: Questions prompting discussion/analysis. Generate 50 flashcards: - 40% Multiple Choice (follow distractor protocol). - 30% Cloze. - 30% Short Answer. - Balance: Layers 1-4 evenly; Bloom's as per schema. - Output JSON array: [{'front': '...', 'back': {'answer': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'references': [...], 'bloom_level': '...', 'scaffolding_layer': '#'}}]. Ensure flashcards promote active recall, spaced repetition, and higher-order thinking.
